Goby is an application for:

1. Systematically organizing files and ideas

2. Visualizing that organization in tables and graphs

Use left/right arrow keys to navigate

“Thinking tool” inspirations

Obsidian

Are.na

Notion

Kinopio

Are.na extension

Linked properties

Space view

New property

“What do you do with this?”

Here are a few examples of how Goby can be used:

  • tag/categorize artworks by author, format, and other metadata
  • plan a novel by mapping relationships between all the characters, locations, themes, motifs, and plot-lines
  • enhance your computer’s file explorer by organizing documents in non-hierarchical groupings

Thank you!

To learn more about the project, you can visit the journal where I regularly document progress, and eventually I will update Goby’s home page as well.

Please enlarge or widen your screen to view properly :)
